and <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, as <S%G1722><s%> he sowed <S%G4687><s%>, some <S%G3303><s%> seed fell <S%G4098><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the way side <S%G3598><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the birds4071, 3772 came <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devoured <S%G2719><s%> it <S%G846><s%>.
